hints.content: The squirrel arranged her acorns into $2$ rows with $4$ acorns in each row.

This array shows $\blueE2$ rows with $\purpleD4$ acorns in each row.

![A group of acorns in 2 rows with 4 acorns in each row. The acorns are numbered across the top 1 through 4. The rows are numbered 1 through 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a258e419dfc603649572ea5dd8b84f3d7bdbc215)

This image shows how the squirrel arranged her acorns: 

![A group of acorns in 2 rows with 4 acorns in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4bb2de0d23744350f9568c6c49ce6ca39abe9a83)

question.content:
A squirrel was preparing for winter. She arranged her acorns by putting them in $2$ rows with $4$ acorns in each row.

**Which image below shows how the squirrel arranged her acorns?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A group of acorns in 2 rows with 4 acorns in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4bb2de0d23744350f9568c6c49ce6ca39abe9a83)
![A group of acorns in 3 rows with 4 acorns in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c46fe1e5fe22dec7527baa821aae166c7a935192)
![A group of acorns in 2 rows with 5 acorns in each row.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e277cececc6cefde1b113b1dbf71333906281b38)
